Context:
An experimental weapon that shoots and works directly commanded by the mind of his owner, but, is his user mentally stable? Maybe yes, just wants bring FREEDOM to fellow countries

Controls:
WASD: Move
MOUSE: Aim
Hold Left Mouse Button: Stop shooting for a while
Release Left Button: Realease some freedom bullets
